summary: This is a grand jury subpoena issued to Tova Noel by the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, commanding her to appear and produce documents and electronic devices. The subpoena specifically demands all materials relating to Jeffrey Epstein and information about her location and activities during the timeframe of August 9-10, 2019, which coincides with Epstein's death in custody.

persons.name: Tova Noel
persons.context: She is commanded to appear before the grand jury and produce documents, records, and electronic devices, including all materials relating to Jeffrey Epstein and information about her location and activities on August 9-10, 2019.

persons.name: Geoffrey S. Berman
persons.role: United States Attorney for the Southern District of New York
persons.context: He is listed as the United States Attorney who issued the subpoena from the Southern District of New York office.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subpoena demands all materials relating to him from Tova Noel, indicating he is central to the grand jury investigation.

connections.description: The subpoena demands all materials Tova Noel has relating to Jeffrey Epstein, indicating she possesses or had access to information about him.
Berman, as U.S. Attorney, issued the grand jury subpoena compelling Noel to appear and produce evidence.

events.title: Grand jury subpoena issued to Tova Noel
events.description: The U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York issued a forthwith grand jury subpoena to Tova Noel, demanding her appearance and production of documents and devices.

events.title: Timeframe of interest for Tova Noel's activities
events.description: The subpoena specifically demands all materials establishing Tova Noel's location and activities between 7 p.m. on August 9, 2019, and 12 p.m. on August 10, 2019.

locations: United States Courthouse, 40 Foley Square, Room 220, Borough of Manhattan, City of New York, New York
One St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: Tova Noel was subpoenaed to appear before a grand jury investigating alleged violations of 18 U.S.C. §§ 371, 1001, and 1519.
The subpoena demands all materials she has relating to Jeffrey Epstein.
It specifically seeks information about her location and activities between 7 p.m. on August 9, 2019, and 12 p.m. on August 10, 2019—the timeframe surrounding Jeffrey Epstein's death in custody.
She is required to produce any cellphone in her possession, custody, or control used since July 6, 2019.
The subpoena was issued by U.S. Attorney Geoffrey S. Berman on August 14, 2019.
